name: Stewardship & Event token FA2
description: This FA2 collection stores all stewardship and event tokens in the project, and also provides multisig functions to view holders and mint.

views.name: get_balance_of
views.description: Get the current balance for a user of the contract.

views.name: get_next_event_token_id
views.description: Get the next_event_token_id in the storage.

views.name: get_next_stewardship_token_id
views.description: Get the get_next_stewardship_token_id in the storage.

views.name: get_token_holders
views.description: Get all the token holders from a token ID.
